author: ishvetso
body: adding puppi isolation for electrons in miniAOD as userFloat(based and on puppi and puppiNoLeptons, calculated using puppiWeight() and puppiWeightNoLep() from packedCandidate). Added a possibility to configure puppi vs puppiNoLeptons in CITKPFIsolationSumProducerForPUPPI which should used in case the weights are taken from packedCandidate. In addition some renaming for puppi photon isolation in miniAOD(minor)
title: Puppi isolation electrons miniaod
